name: Move Roll Die
description:
A Celshaded 2,5D puzzle game about rolling dice across buttons, boxes, doors and of course the finish line. It has 6 levels with some really nice A-HA moments. I know 6 levels isn't a lot but quality over quantity, right? hehe...

Controls:

WASD / Arrow Keys - Move/Roll

Z - Undo

Escape - Return to level select

I made all the assets for this game except the music which my dad made.
